title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When searching for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the search results are not selected. The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows:
SR:
1. Ensure that JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE and that you have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open the java.io.File class.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Confirm that the search results for references to the selected field are not automatically highlighted or selected.
